content.body: Dominic Farolino: hmm yeah — but I guess for going forward at least, should go ahead and make one
content.formatted_body: Dominic Farolino: hmm yeah — but I guess for going forward at least, should go ahead and make one

content.body: There is a "browsing context" label, but maybe one for "iframe" would be useful
Yeah I haven't been happy with our labels around browsing contexts / navigables / iframes for a while, but didn't feel up to re-tagging stuff...
Ah browsing context is useful. Shoulda searched that..
if i'm at a particular heading such as `4.10.21.8` is there anyway to see the section hierarchy of it?
content.formatted_body: if i'm at a particular heading such as 4.10.21.8 is there anyway to see the section hierarchy of it?

content.body: No (besides looking at the TOC). https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/5649 + https://github.com/whatwg/whatwg.org/issues/320 envisions something that would help with this.
